Hi, I am Prabhakar. I am a senior at MIT majoring in Computer Science with a concentration in Economics. I am interested in education technology, web, photography, and hiking. If any of these excite you, I would love to connect and talk!!!

Currently I am interning at Balbix in the data engineering team. My project is focused on developing integration pipelines for third-party APIs. Besides the internship, I am also building this website and exploring California.

I grew up in Biratnagar, Nepal and did my high school in Kathmandu. I am very much interested in working in some education related project in Nepal. If you are also interested and have some idea or would like to brainstorm together, feel free to reach out.

At MIT, I have been working as an undergraduate researcher for the last three years in various labs. Here are some of the research projects I have worked on. I am also currently the president of MITeri- Nepali student association at MIT.
